tweets.text:
I've heard the @EnvAgency are surprised NGOs are refusing to work with them.

Why?

The River Avon catchment is comprised of 5 chalk streams protected as SSSI and SAC. In 2020 @wessexwater spent 26,916 hours dumping sewage into the river.

https://t.co/zslGdsV3lC

tweets.text: The smell and high hydrogen sulphide levels suggest gypsum being deposited. Gypsum should be landfilled in a mono-cell. This has been the rule for years but like much else never enforced adequately by @EnvAgency. https://t.co/PjUQ5dQNCZ

Exposure to a chemical on a daily basis ‚Äòchronic exposure‚Äô IS long term exposure.Nausea/vomiting on a daily basis can damage airways &  sleep has a known impact on wellbeing... unacceptable & a waste of tax money!!  @StaffordshireCC @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe https://t.co/8ZsIFlePqe

urls.title: Calls for more action to prevent sewage leaks

tweets.text: Leaks have caused health risks to swimmers and paddle boarders, as well as affecting businesses at Crantock Beach. South West Water said it was working to replace the sewer. https://t.co/8WQqQtMTSP
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids 1. It is worth investigating if the site operator are sneakily opening the gas extractor wellheads at night to release the noxious gas.

It's absolutely disgusting tonight!!! The weather conditions cannot create the perfect storm EVERY weekend! @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink #capitoff
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids 2. What is supposed to happen with the gas? How is it processed? Should it not be turned into renewable energy? So many questions?

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids The whole site if need be is correct Aaron   This serious issue has been prolonged needlessly and now needs to be sorted and quickly. People have had enough of this dreadful stink and rightly deserve much better from the Agency !!

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids If @EnvAgencyMids had not ignored residents complaints for so long it would not have got this bad.They are not fit for purpose and a independent enquiry needs to happen to find out why the issues at Walley‚Äôs Quarry was ignored for so many months/years @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids How has it been allowed to spread this far over such a long time?? With this many complaints about it?? What is being hidden?? How much is at stake here?? And for who?? We are not stupid. Why is big business more important than kid‚Äôs health?? Our health seems unimportant?? Why??

@PJennings88 @EnvAgency Been like that for a while - and they take the water industry's advice on whether it is serious - the most ridiculous mismanagement of regulation imaginable but presumably how @DefraGovUK wants it. No confidence in @EnvAgency is long overdue.

Heard from sources that the @EnvAgency are planning to radically change their pollution response procedure. Will now only attend serious pollution incidents. Begs the question define serious & how would they know if they do not attend? Replace one broken system with another.

@a_merrydew @Samanth33412592 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @BorisJohnson @PHE_uk @PHE_EoEngland @PHE_WestMids ...ahead when we need a rest. But as a group we either roll over& allow them to poison us or we continue to fight. And fight we will. And we will win. Because we are right. This is criminal. This is immoral. And we won‚Äôt let them break us ‚ù§Ô∏è
